metadata.name: Galaxian #001
metadata.description:
Galaxians: The Space Refugees is an NFT collection of 1/1 extraterrestrial hobos, gathered from each and every corner of the Galaxy. They live on their big, rusty mothership and they travel through space in order to find a new home planet. Recently, Space Refugees have reached Earth's orbit and now they are waiting for the Terrans to adopt them. Galaxians come in a diverse range of species, traits and peculiarities. Created with humor and the retro-vibe of an old sci-fi, this NFT collection raises questions of humanism, equality, and interpersonal relationships. 
   NFT technology gave an opportunity for bubble gum wrappers to be reborn, showing up out of half-forgotten childhood memoriesâ€¦  
   This collectibles project is created by Weichensteller; the working alias for Sergei Degtyaryov, a Ukrainian-based artist, working both in traditional physical oil and digital media.
